sense.def:
Kadar človek
qualifies
, naredi vse potrebne izpite, da lahko opravlja neko dejavnost.

seg.quote: I was thirty-three before I qualified as a doctor.
Even after qualification, jobs were hard to find.

sense.def:
To qualify a statement
pomeni, da neki izjavi dodamo kakšno podrobnost ali razlago, da jo omilimo ali omejimo njeno splošno veljavnost.

seg.quote: If I said that Warsaw was grim and grey, that statement has to be qualified.

sense.def:
To qualify for something
pomeni, da imamo do tistega pravico.

seg.quote: By working all their lives, people qualify automatically for their pensions.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
qualifies in a competition
, je v enem delu tekmovanja tako uspešen, da lahko nastopi na višji stopnji tekmovanja.

seg.quote: He worked all season to qualify for the match.
